_comment: Emulator system configuration. Edit pathMappings to match where the game files live on your machine.

pathMappings._comment: Map Windows drive/path prefixes to Linux paths. Keys are Windows prefixes (backslash or forward slash, case-insensitive). Values are the corresponding Linux directory (must end with /).

_interactiveOnMissingFile_comment: When true, pause emulation and prompt the user when a requested file is not found on disk. The user can add the file then retry, or continue without it.
